titles.title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.
Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: This resolution elects specified Members to the Committee on Armed Services; the Committee on Foreign Affairs; the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology; and the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
